title: Samantha's Spanish chicken rice
ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 chicken breast, cut into chunks', '2 peppers, cut into strips', '2 onions, thickly sliced', '1 stick celery, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '80g chorizo, peeled and cut into 0.5cm slices', '4 sun dried tomatoes, chopped', '135g rice', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'good pinch cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 heaped tablespoons paprika or smoked paprika', '300ml chicken stock', 'good squirt tomato puree', '150ml white wine']
